Subject: In the Brig
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

GTG everyone. Good night.

::Rex/Perndabot::

Rex looks frowns at Gangon, frowning. He turns around as he sees Gangon 
looking at someone, his eyes widening as he sees BrightBlade's condition. He 
swears. Why hadn't Firearm noticed?

Rex walks over to the cell and unlocks it. He walks in, his gun ready just in 
case. Bending down, he picks up BrightBlade, carrying her off toward the 
brig's CR chambers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot swears, receaving BrightBlade's transmission. She was in the brig? 
And he was supposed to rescue her?! He growls, crawling toward the 
Cybertronian Fire.
